title: Fonts similar to Leviathan HTC?
content: I'm working with old creative and do not have Leviathan HTC to edit the copy. Is there something similar I can use to maintain the same look and feel?
author: meesheca

comments.content:
Do you mean Leviathan \*HTF\*?

What about [Bureau Grot Ultra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20130216003614/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BureauGrot) or [Maple](http://web.archive.org/web/20130216003614/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/maple/index.html)?
